name: Opal Estimated Delivery for Woocommerce
author: WPOPAL

sections.description:
Opal Estimated Delivery for Woocommerce add-on plugin is an indispensable addon for WooCommerce that takes your delivery logistics to the next level: The Delivery Date Calculator. Say goodbye to the guessing game of delivery dates and hello to precision and efficiency. With our plugin, you have full control over the delivery schedule, tailored to suit your business needs. Seamlessly integrated with WooCommerce

Features

  • Choosing display position estimated date on single product
  • Show/Hide in cart and order
  • Choosing date format
  • Using Shortcode [oedw]
  • Settings rules for product, category, … or Shipping method
  • Exclude some days, holiday, or after Cutoff time
  • Import/Export settings

Benefits:

  • Creates unique and interactive products for shoppers.
  • Improves sales performance and enhances the user experience.
  • Facilitates easy and flexible integration with any WooCommerce interface.

Our plugin ensures that your customers receive accurate delivery estimates every time.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/’ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate plugin ‘Opal Estimated Delivery for Woocommerce’ from Plugins page
sections.faq:
Can I use one rule for multiple products?

Of course. You can attach the rule to one or more product categories, or simply attach it to each product.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 – Fix bugs review

1.0 – Released: Mar 19, 2024

  • Initial release
